item.title: Kioptrix
item.description: Kioptrix is a vulnerable machine from VulnHub. Setup #Once we have downloaded the files from Vulnhub, we can import the virtual machine into either Virtual Box or VmWare.

item.title: Writeups
item.description: A writeup is a document which describes the process in which a puzzle / problem was solved. These puzzles or problems are generally from CTFs or from vulnerable machines
